瀢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》以水切，上旨，定。］
见“瀢瀢”。
[②]［duì］
［《廣韻》徒猥切，上賄，定。］
亦作“濻1”。
见“瀢2沱”、“瀢2”。

瀢字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀢； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页660第14
【廣韻】以水切【集韻】愈水切，?音唯瀢瀢，魚行相隨貌。一曰魚盛謂之瀢。一曰水流貌。通作唯。亦作遺。　又【集韻】一曰膏液。　又【唐韻】徒對切【集韻】杜罪切，?音鐓。瀢?，水泛沙動貌。【郭璞·江賦】碧沙瀢?而往來。或從隤作濻。　又【集韻】都外切，音?。義同。

瀢字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瀢字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" is cut with water, decree and fixed. ]
See "瀢瀢".
[②]［duì］
["Guangyun" is only to cut, take bribes, and set. ]
Also known as "濻1".
See "瀢2岱", "瀢2".
瀢
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　瀢; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 660 14
[Guangyun] Cut with water [Jiyun] Cut with more water, the sound is only 瀢瀢, the fish line follows the appearance. One said that Yu Sheng is called Zhi Cheng. One is the appearance of the water flow. Pass for nothing. Also as a legacy.　[Jiyun] Yi said ointment.　[Tang Yun] Discretionary cut [Ji Yun] Du sin cut,? Sound upsetting. Ding?, the water is flooded with sand. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Bishajing? Or from Kuan Zuozhu.　[Jiyun] are all cut outside, sound?. The same meaning.
